document_data.mainbody:
Ishaldra was a dryad princess and a powerful fey of Kryptgarden Forest in 1489 DR.
She advised her companion prince Witchthorn, balancing his evil inclinations with her good nature.
In 1489 DR, the arrival of Claugiyliamatar corrupted Ishaldra and her treant bodyguard. The corruption, coming in the form of poisoned waters, paralyzed Ishaldra and drove her treant mad. Eventually, an adventuring party hired to defeat Old Gnawbones freed them from corruption and in exchange they were directed to King Witchthorn.
